title: Human inhalation exposure assessment of the airborne microplastics from indoor deposited dusts during winter in Dhaka, Bangladesh
content:
Publication date: 30 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 16

Author(s): Md. Zubayer Islam, Shahid Uz Zaman, Nafis Ibtida Sami, Shatabdi Roy, Farah Jeba, Md. Safiqul Islam, Abdus Salam
